roleset.name: behaving violently
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, comparison to 'cruel.01'.

example.name: arg1
example.text: But from what i 've observed via TSR and many news sources ; the way they 're trying to achieve them , is largely violent EDIT : specific coverage of EDL , whom seem to make the headlines a little more .
example.arg: from what i've observed via TSR and many news sources
the way they're trying to achieve them

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: "I was violent toward *everybody*... because I hated myself & I wanted them to feel the pain I felt at the time." MikeTyson.
example.arg: because I hated myself & I wanted them to feel the pain I felt at the time

example.name: arg1
example.text: The American government has paid for numerous research efforts to determine if video games are violent
